title: special weapon zac recall
body: Special weapon zacs recall makes no sound post rework when it did before?

replies.body:
Hey Staff Sergeant Elmo! 

I am currently looking into this. I had no idea the sound stopped working so thank you :D
Thank you for the fast reply and no probem! :D

Hey SSG Elmo!

After looking into it... are you sure there was a sound? I am having a hard time finding that. If you say there was, I'll believe you! However I am not able to find what sound it made before.
